name: insignia
description: Customizable tag input. Progressive. No non-sense!

scripts.start: watchify -s insignia -do dist/insignia.js insignia.js & stylus -w insignia.styl -o dist
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s insignia -do dist/insignia.js insignia.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/insignia.min.js dist/insignia.js
scripts.styles: stylus insignia.styl -o dist && cleancss dist/insignia.css -o dist/insignia.min.css
scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.deployment: git add . && git commit -am "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" ; npm version ${BUMP:-"patch"} --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m "Autogenerated pre-deployment commit" && bower version ${BUMP:-"patch"} && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deployment

author: Nicolas Bevacqua <nicolasbevacqua@gmail.com> (http://bevacqua.io/)
